name: Project Atlas
overview: A secure banking prototype allowing users to connect accounts and initiate transfers.
challenge: Building a secure, reliable application that integrates with multiple financial services while keeping the UX simple.
solution: Implemented a robust architecture with encrypted data handling, real-time verification, and audit-friendly logging.
your_role: Designed and developed the full application, including authentication, dashboards, and transaction flows.

results.impact: Demonstrated capability in building secure, high-stakes applications.

name: Project Beacon
overview: A collaborative editor with live cursors and AI-assisted writing features.
challenge: Synchronizing edits across multiple users without conflicts while keeping latency low.
solution: Built a real-time engine with websocket synchronization and AI-assisted suggestions.
your_role: Full-stack implementation of collaboration, persistence, and AI integration.

results.impact: Created a seamless collaborative writing environment.

name: Project Cascade
overview: A platform for running events with registration, submissions, and scoring.
challenge: Coordinating multiple roles, workflows, and evaluations in a single system.
solution: Designed a scalable data model and built dashboards with real-time updates.
your_role: Architected the data model and built the end-to-end user experience.

results.impact: Simplifies the logistics of running multi-stage events.
